name: Bird On A Wire Free
description:
★★★★★ Thank you for making Bird On A Wire Free our most downloaded game of all time! In appreciation, you can now play up to 200,000 points and unlock new characters including the pesky squirrel & white dove! ★★★★★

Flock birds of a feather onto the same wires to score huge points! But don't overload your wires with too many birds or they will break!

★ FREE VERSION FEATURES
✔ Rich HD resolution graphics
✔ Compete with GameCenter friends & global players
✔ Reach goals to unlock new birds & special characters
✔ Play with real-world physics
✔ Capture & post your magic moments & scores directly to Facebook
✔ Savegame disabled
✔ Play up to 100,000 points

★ PAID VERSION INCLUDES
✔ Autosaving your game progress
✔ Unlimited gameplay and stages
✔ Free content updates with new birds, characters & powerups!

★ GAMEPLAY
You'll need quick fingers and strategies to progress to some truly huge scores.

Simply tap a bird to drop it to the next wire. Each time a bird lands on a wire that's unoccupied or occupied by the same colored bird you'll score points.

Let too many birds on the same wire and... Snap! It's game over if all 3 of your wires snap before the stage ends!

★ OFFICIAL VIDEO
www.youtube.com/watch?v=_EoGzzE1qd4


★ BECOME A FAN
